description:
Attraction where players have
60 minutes to solve puzzles
& escape from 1 of 5 themed
rooms.

People say this bowling alley offers
a fun vibe and a variety of games
including darts. They also highlight
the friendly and helpful staff, and
the accommodating service for large
groups and people with disabilities.
Other reviews mention the prices can
be high

Vibrant yet laid-back pub
with old-meets-new decor
featuring exposed brickwork
and an open fire.

Compact candle-lit bar
celebrating Charles Bukowski
and offering a choice of
bourbons, plus garden.

Compact candle-lit bar
celebrating Charles Bukowski
and offering a choice of
bourbons, plus garden.

address: Ballyogan Business Park, Unit 6, Ballyogan Rd, Dublin 18, D18 CF57, Ireland

description:
People say this leisure center offers
fun axe throwing with interactive
games and different throwing
techniques. They highlight the helpful
tips and demonstrations provided by
the staff, and the safe and enjoyable
experience. They also like the friendly
and attentive service.
0+44 Summarised
